titleInfo.title: Circular letter no.769 of 1820, from James Bruce Simson, Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Simson encloses an original communication (not included in the file) for Bruce's comments, from a committee appointed to investigate the issues raised by Bruce in his letters of 22 and 26 April 1820. Simson further requests that Bruce state the grounds on which he believes the Commander of the vessel Elizato be guilty of cruelty to his crew.
